Name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
Title: A Thousand Nights' Dawnsong: A Thousand Floating Dreams
Desc: "There is an appointed time for all things to live and die, just like the ceaseless cycles of night and dawn."\n"May the stories within this lamp grant you dreams worth looking forward to."

Talent.Name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When your character triggers an Elemental Reaction:</color> Deal +1 DMG. (Twice per Round)\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3201}Catalyst Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
